content:
path /v3/ipfs
operationId StoreIPFS
summary Store data to IPFS
description 2 credits per API call Only files up to 50MB are available for storing
Stores file on the IPFS We are leveraging nftstorage from Protocol Labs for free storage on the IPFS
requestBody
schema
type object
file
type string
format binary
description Your file to store
required True
responses
200
schema
type object
ipfsHash
type string
description IPFS CID identifier of the stored file
description OK
